Since 2001 and in several countries around the world, World Bath Day has been celebrated on 19 November to highlight the importance of basic sanitation for global health. It was officially recognized by the UN in 2013 and aims to alert the population to the fact that more than 2.4 billion people do not have access to a clean, safe and private bathroom.
